snippet: “He needs to get some sleep and shut up.” — Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, a Republican running for president, referring to Secretary of State John Kerry and his claim that there was a “rationale” to the Charlie Hebdo attacks in Paris.
abstract: “He needs to get some sleep and shut up.” — Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, a Republican running for president, referring to Secretary of State John Kerry and his claim that there was a “rationale” to the Charlie Hebdo attacks in Paris.

headline.main: Verbatim: Chris Christie Gives John Kerry the Goodnight
